name: Interference (itch) (n00bstar)
description:
Defend The Almighty Circle(tm) from the Evil Polygons(tm) using your trusty old Triangular Shooty Thing(tm).

Controls : AD to move, LMB/RMB to shoot, F1/F2 to toggle sfx, ESC for gameover

The game is playable, but there might be some bugs left. I might add some different gameplay modes later as I have a few more ideas I'd like to try with this one.
